SEQN.label: Respondent sequence number
SEQN.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SLQ300.label: Usual sleep time on weekdays or workdays
SLQ300.text: What time do you usually fall asleep on weekdays or workdays?
SLQ300.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SLQ310.label: Usual wake time on weekdays or workdays
SLQ310.text: What time do you usually wake up on weekdays or workdays?
SLQ310.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SLD012.label: Sleep hours - weekdays or workdays
SLD012.text: Number of hours usually sleep on weekdays or workdays.
SLD012.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SLQ320.label: Usual sleep time on weekends
SLQ320.text: What time do you usually fall asleep on weekends or non-workdays?
SLQ320.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SLQ330.label: Usual wake time on weekends
SLQ330.text: What time do you usually wake up on weekends or non-workdays?
SLQ330.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SLD013.label: Sleep hours - weekends
SLD013.text: Number of hours usually sleep on weekends or non-workdays.
SLD013.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SLQ030.label: How often do you snore?
SLQ030.text: In the past 12 months, how often did you snore while sleeping?
SLQ030.instructions: INTERVIEWER INSTRUCTION: IF R SAYS 'DON'T KNOW', PROBE IF ANYONE HAS TOLD THEM THEY SNORE.
SLQ030.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

3.description: Frequently - 5 or more nights a week

SLQ040.label: How often do you snort or stop breathing?
SLQ040.text: In the past 12 months, how often did you snort, gasp, or stop breathing while asleep?
SLQ040.instructions: INTERVIEWER INSTRUCTION: PROBE IF ANYONE TOLD THEM THAT THEY DO THIS.
SLQ040.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

3.description: Frequently - 5 or more nights a week

SLQ050.label: Ever told doctor had trouble sleeping?
SLQ050.text: Have you ever told a doctor or health professional that you have trouble sleeping?
SLQ050.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SLQ120.label: How often feel overly sleepy during the day?
SLQ120.text: In the past month, how often did you feel excessively or overly sleepy during the day?
SLQ120.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS
